ModMetaData.name: Wooly Yaks
ModMetaData.author: zoura3025
ModMetaData.description: Version: 1.0 This mod adds wool to Yaks, as their fur is used for various items in real life. It's quite a good wool, providing bonuses to many stats over typical animal wools. It also makes it so yaks produce milk (female only) AND wool, as well as being usable as pack animals.
